title: Default values are not shown in Show Report Parameters' dialog
OB: When previewing a report and clicking on the 'Show Report Parameters' button, the Enter Parameters dialog is displayed. In this dialog, all parameter values are empty.
EB: I expect that when I click the 'Show Report Parameters' button, the Enter Parameters dialog should display the default values for each parameter. This would allow me to easily modify the parameters that I want to change, without having to manually input all the values.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create several report parameters.
2. Set default values for these parameters.
3. Drag the parameters to the report layout.
4. Preview the report.
5. Click on the 'Show Report Parameters' button to open the Enter Parameters dialog.

Note: Make sure that at least one parameter has a default value set.
